snippet: InsideClimate News, which won the Pulitzer for national reporting, exemplifies a new breed of news organization that depends on donations.
abstract: InsideClimate News, which won the Pulitzer for national reporting, exemplifies a new breed of news organization that depends on donations; news start up, with staff of just seven and nonprofit business model, was presented with journalism's highest honor, prize typically awarded to regional and national newspapers.
lead_paragraph: InsideClimate News, which won the Pulitzer for national reporting, exemplifies a new breed of news organization that depends on donations.

headline.seo: InsideClimate News Hopes to Build on Pulitzer
headline.main: A Pulitzer Prize, but Without a Newsroom to Put It In
headline.print_headline: A Pulitzer Prize, but Without a Newsroom to Put It In
